data.name: Hex of Steel
data.detailed_description:
Official Discord server : https://discord.gg/Tn63mrwJyH

With a failed Kickstarter campaign and 53 euros in our pocket, my brother and I decided to get the game done even with all odds against us !

Why should you be getting HoS and not the other wargames out there ? I'm glad you asked !

Key features

  • Adaptive AI that doesn't cheat
  • Gigantic scenarios (Europe, North Africa, Pacific, Italy ...)
  • No turn limit, no unit limit (unless you set one in the map editor or play with the manpower mechanics)
  • Cross-platform (Mac, Windows, Linux, iOS, Android) Real time multiplayer and PBEM multiplayer
  • Standard unit representation or NATO one at the push of a key!
  • Capture almost any unit you'd like and use it in your army
  • Branched campaigns with core units system (Keep certain units and their history throughout an entire campaign)
  • Basic diplomacy
  • Over 50 policies (Doctrines, occupation, conscription, infrastructures) to personalize your gameplay!
  • Many editors in the base game (tile, unit, country, scenario)
  • A random scenario generator (WIP)
  • Dynamic weather SFX and GFX
  • Public Steam leaderboard, compare how well you did with other Steam players!
  • Many, many interesting and original mechanics and totally optional!

Strict no DLCs policy here

The game on iOS (4.3/5) : https://apps.apple.com/us/app/operation-citadel/id1532682161
The game on Android (4.7/5) : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.valentinstudio.OperationCitadel&hl=en&gl=US

data.short_description: Hex of Steel is a refreshing WWII wargame covering all fronts featuring a certain amount of original mechanics. Fight in solo against finally a decent AI throughout Europe, Africa or the Pacific, or against a friend in the cross-platform PBEM or real time multiplayer. Coop is also an option !
data.reviews:
“Remember the name ‘Valentin Lievre‘. If this relatively young (21), inexperienced* French coder can produce a WW2 TBS as compendious and competent as Operation Citadel in under a year then heaven knows what wonders he’ll produce in the decades to come.”
RockPaperShotgun

“Overall, I’m pleasantly surprised with Operation Citadel. There’s a lot to like here if you’re in the mood for a light, simple Panzer General-like. The inclusion of the gigantic scenarios offers something unique and interesting, and the potential of the building tools is almost unlimited.”
https://www.wargamer.com/reviews/operation-citadel/

“Hex of Steel will undoubtedly stay one of the marking title of the beginning of this 21st century”
4/5 – https://www.wargamer.fr/hex-of-steel-la-passion-contre-attaque/
